name: Asking Out Simulator
description:
My New Game JAZZ & BLUES is out now : sanchitgulati.itch.io/jazz-and-blues

This game is an experiment with interactive text based adventure, where you as a guy tries to ask a girl out.

Lacks depth as of this moment, but hopefully you will enjoy.

game for Ludum Dare 31 #LDJAM

link : http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-31/?action=p...
